text: Unai Emery Etxegoien (; born 3 November 1971) is a Spanish football manager and former player. He currently is the manager of Premier League club Aston Villa. == References == Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish football managers Category:Spanish footballers Category:People from the Basque Country Category:Valencia CF managers Category:Sevilla FC managers
title: Unai Emery
